name: Passi vorticosi
desc: Nilou's specialty. The crystal-clear cup that reminds you of an ornate jewel case contains a soft, melt-in-your-mouth pudding. The reddish coloration, like a fleeting trance, reminds you ever so much of Nilou's radiant, dancing form. Ah, would that this dance might last forever.

customize.name: Ricetta: budino di Padisarah
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Padisarah Pudding.

customize.name: Padisarah
customize.desc: Pianta sacra e nobile, le cui condizioni di crescita nel suo ambiente sono molto esigenti. I boccioli dei suoi fiori possono essere lavorati per preparare spezie preziose.

customize.name: Rosa di Sumeru
customize.desc: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

customize.name: Latte
customize.desc: Latte di mucca dolce e aromatico. Non sprecarne neanche una goccia, neanche quella rimasta sulle tue labbra.

customize.name: Zucchero
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Budino di Padisarah
customize.desc: A popular dessert in Sumeru. Juices are squeezed from the petals of Padisarahs and Sumeru Roses before being mixed with milk, gelatin, sugar, and other ingredients, and then left to solidify. Cute appearance and sweet flavor make it a common sight at celebratory events in Sumeru.

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc: La stella del Teatro Zubayr. Una fanciulla piena di calore e innocenza, che si esibisce in danze vivaci ed eleganti.

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
